languages.text: "Я скорблю о ней. И горжусь тобой, Второй ткач. Твоя вера неоспорима".
"I grieve for her. And I am proud of you, Second Spinner. Your faith is beyond doubt."
languages.original_text: "Я скорблю о ней. И горжусь тобой, Второй ткач. Твоя вера неоспорима".

traits.locale_text: "I grieve for her. And I am proud of you, Second Weaver. Your faith is beyond doubt."
"I grieve for her. And I am proud of you, Second Weaver. Your faith is beyond doubt."
"I grieve for her. And I am proud of you, Second Spinner. Your faith is beyond doubt."
"I grieve for her. And I am proud of you, Second Spinner. Your faith is beyond doubt."
"I grieve for her. And I am proud of you, Second Spinner. Your faith is beyond doubt."
"I grieve for her. And I am proud of you, Second Spinner. Your faith is beyond doubt."

languages.text: « Je suis désolé pour elle. Et je suis fier de vous, deuxième tisseuse. Votre foi ne fait aucun doute. »
languages.original_text: "I grieve for her. And I am proud of you, Second Spinner. Your faith is beyond doubt."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis désolé pour elle. Et je suis fier de vous, deuxième tisseuse. Votre foi ne fait aucun doute. »

languages.text: «Lloro por ella. Y estoy orgullosa de ti, Segunda Tejedora. Dudar de tu fe está fuera de lugar».
languages.original_text: "I grieve for her. And I am proud of you, Second Spinner. Your faith is beyond doubt."

traits.locale_text: «Lloro por ella. Y estoy orgullosa de ti, Segunda Tejedora. Dudar de tu fe está fuera de lugar».

languages.text: 「彼女のことを悼んでいる。それからお前を誇りに思うぞ、第二の織り手よ。曇りなき信仰心だ」
languages.original_text: "I grieve for her. And I am proud of you, Second Spinner. Your faith is beyond doubt."

traits.locale_text: 「彼女のことを悼んでいる。それからお前を誇りに思うぞ、第二の織り手よ。曇りなき信仰心だ」

languages.text: “我为她感到难过，也为你感到骄傲，次席织网者。你的虔诚无毋庸置疑。”
languages.original_text: "I grieve for her. And I am proud of you, Second Spinner. Your faith is beyond doubt."

traits.locale_text: “我为她感到难过，也为你感到骄傲，次席织网者。你的虔诚无毋庸置疑。”

languages.text: "Ich trauere um sie. Und ich bin stolz auf Euch, Zweite Weberin. Euer Glaube ist über jeden Zweifel erhaben."
languages.original_text: "I grieve for her. And I am proud of you, Second Spinner. Your faith is beyond doubt."

traits.locale_text: "Ich trauere um sie. Und ich bin stolz auf Euch, Zweite Weberin. Euer Glaube ist über jeden Zweifel erhaben."

languages.text: "Onun matemini tutacağım. Seninleyse gurur duyuyorum İkinci Dokur. İnancından kuşku duymaya mahal yok."
languages.original_text: "I grieve for her. And I am proud of you, Second Spinner. Your faith is beyond doubt."
